Player History
Drafted in 2nd round, 46th overall pick, by Penn in 1975...
Traded from Penn to Gashouse on 3/2/1975 (Going to PEN: C A. Hughs. Going to GHG: P T. Acuña, P C. Schweitzer)...
Injured on 4/30/1978 with a Strained Back Muscle, out for 1-2 weeks...
Injured on 6/9/1979 with a Pulled Elbow Ligament, out for one week...
Injured on 8/14/1979 with a Stiff Shoulder, out for one week...
Injured on 4/30/1982 with a Hyper Extended Elbow, out for 1-2 weeks...
Released by Gashouse on 4/7/1987...
Signed as a free agent by West Texas on 6/5/1987 to a minor league deal...
Earned first career win on 8/4/1987...
Pitched NO-HITTER against Lynchburg on 6/2/1990, striking out 4...
